author: Daniel Greene
description:
New Brandon Sanderson cover reveal! New TBR Merch is live at https://danielbgreene.com/  Ken Liu announces a brand-new fantasy novel! And Greta Gerwig’s Narnia movie has officially cast its White Witch.

In today’s Fantasy News:

Isles of the Emberdark cover reveal from Dragonsteel

Gollancz signs J.T. Greathouse for a major new fantasy trilogy

Ken Liu’s exciting return

New narrator announced for The Wandering Inn

A never-before-seen Robert Jordan letter published by Tor

Narnia and Hunger Games casting updates

Amazon’s suspicious book sale timing

New Reanimator movie adaptation

Plus trailers for Dandadan Season 2, Legend of Ochi, and Predator: Badlands!

📚 My Books:
Neon Ghosts: A Witch's Sin Hardcover: https://shop.wraithmarked.com/collections/standard-editions-1/products/neon-ghosts-a-witchs-sin-hardcover
Breach of Peace: https://tinyurl.com/BoPTLT
Rebels Creed: https://tinyurl.com/RCTLTDG

👕 Merch and More: https://www.danielbgreene.com
🎥 Second Channel: https://www.youtube.
title: New Sanderson Cover, New Ken Liu Novel, & Narnia Casting! | Fantasy News
